name: GET OUTTA MY DUNGEON
description:
A Horde of so called 'Heros' is approaching the lich's castle!

Defend his gold by all means! Or he wont be able to pay his dungeon-rent anymore next month :(

How to play:

- Select spells on the top right

- Click on the floor to cast it.

Coded by Scayze(me yay) and Ash, who has done all the amazing artwork!

The Linux and OSX versions are untested as of now, let me know if you have troubles with it :D

Assets used:

- The Music:
